avatar: Shows the avatar of the mentioned user (usage: `avatar [user]`)
fisheye: Applies a fisheye effect to an image (usage: `fisheye [amount = 0+]`)
greyscale: Applies a greyscale filter to the image
jpeg: Runs JPEG compression on an image (usage: `jpeg [quality = 0-100]`)
jpeg2: Pixelates and applies colour banding to an image
caption: Adds a caption to an image (usage: `caption <text>`)
caption2: Adds a caption of an alternate style to an image (usage: `caption2 <text>`)
motivate: Adds a demotivational poster caption to an image (usage: `motivate <text> | [text]`)
evenframes: Returns a GIF image with only its even frames, preserving the speed of the GIF.
speed: Doubles the speed of a GIF
slow: Halves the speed of a GIF
square: Crops the image to a square
sepia: Applies a sepia filter to the image
